meanings.sent1: The party was very eventful with games and music.
meanings.sent2: Her vacation was so eventful, she visited five different countries.
meanings.sent3: The eventful day ended with a surprise cake for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The eventful journey through the forest felt like a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The eventful movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.

meanings.definition: Marked by interesting or significant happenings
meanings.sent1: The history class was quite eventful with stories of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: Their eventful relationship was filled with ups and downs.
meanings.sent3: The eventful meeting had everyone laughing at the boss's jokes.
meanings.sent4: The eventful year brought many unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The eventful book kept readers engaged till the very end.
